<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">Almost  shut it down and went to bed but I had to comment on this.  Without anything in terms of reference support, for now I will say it is my belief that YOU are a medium...or rather THE medium.  Particularly in the case of EVP technology each of us are actually an integral  part of the ANTENNA/RADIO system.  Some people are better receptors than others (vibration, chemistry, mental attitude, openness, who know exactly why) but I do also believe that we all have the potential to medium-ship...with EVP or classic Spiritualist activity.  Unfortunately, I find that I need to work really hard, by my definition of hard work, to get any results many here and in other groups seem to be more turned in.  Not complaining, just observing and commenting.  It makes me a lifelong learner I suppose.  Now
 I can go to bed.  lol    ron<BR>--- On <B>Sat, 10/11/08, Black Bear Hollow <I><blackbearhollow@...></I></B> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Black Bear Hollow <blackbearhollow@...><BR>Subject: Re: [EVP-<SPAN>ITC</SPAN>] Possession<BR>To: <A href="mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com">EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com</A> <BR>Date: Saturday, October 11, 2008, 7:20 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv1884562515>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>Yep. I have the same wonderings. Also, I'm taking workshops on being a Medium. And I ponder, are the boxes the mediums or are we. I consider myself a servant to Spirit. What makes us seek out this research? Is it coincidence or are we but tools for a higher purpose we don't yet comprehend? Always more questions than answers. It's hard for me to wap all dis awound my widdow haid too! lol! 
<DIV><BR></DIV>
<DIV>w.<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV>On Oct 11, 2008, at 9:02 PM, <A href="mailto:threadsintyme@..." target=_blank rel=nofollow>threadsintyme@ juno.com</A> wrote:</DIV><BR class=Apple-interchange-newline>
<BLOCKQUOTE type="cite"><SPAN class=Apple-style-span style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 13px; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); TEXT-INDENT: 0px; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: Georgia; LETTER-SPACING: normal; BORDER-COLLAPSE: separate; FONT-VARIANT: normal">
<DIV>That or what about now choosing to make contact with this dimension? This is something that I have been kicking around in my widdle haid for some time.</DIV>
<DIV>I believe that it is possible for the next dimension to make itself aware to us...by communicating be it through a medium (for example) or an iPhone...or a Hack Shack box. These are merely different ways of communicating.  </DIV>
<DIV>If things are progressing, how long will it be that we will be communicating continuously with the other side? How far and to what purpose will this communicating unfold? To what end? (This element really intrigues me).</DIV>
<DIV>Al </DIV></SPAN></BLOCKQUOTE></DIV><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
